channel.title: Comments on: More fun with the Hainan family
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Will
item.description: I might have to travel all the way to the H-O-O-nan province.
item.content:encoded: I might have to travel all the way to the H-O-O-nan province.

item.title: by: Michelle
item.description: I say you just get Hainan Daddy $22 worth of Hainan Hooker and call it a D-A-Y.
item.content:encoded: I say you just get Hainan Daddy $22 worth of Hainan Hooker and call it a D-A-Y.

item.title: by: marcus
item.description:
You should find out when the next birthday is in there family and buy a big cake with a picture of Hainan, and fireworks then take a picture of it and get it framed so they can keep it. $22 bucks worth... eh.. eh...
Or you could black mail dad with the hotel thing and then repay him with your silence!
item.content:encoded:
You should find out when the next birthday is in there family and buy a big cake with a picture of Hainan, and fireworks then take a picture of it and get it framed so they can keep it. $22 bucks worth… eh.. eh…

Or you could black mail dad with the hotel thing and then repay him with your silence!
